name: Basic Techniques
flavor: These techniques require no significant training and are automatically granted to all characters for free.

techniques.name: Quick Strike
techniques.desc: A quick blow, sacrificing striking strength for speed.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. _Versatile_ Weapons take a -2 damage penalty.

techniques.name: Strike
techniques.desc: A standard strike, balancing damage and speed.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile.

techniques.name: Strong Strike
techniques.desc: A mighty blow, sacrificing power for speed.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile, dealing +1 damage bonus with a _Versatile_ weapon or +2 with a _Heavy_ weapon.

techniques.name: Run
techniques.desc: A simple dash, covering ground as quickly as possible.
techniques.move:
The movement granted by Run determines its Speed, as follows:
* Reposition: Speed 1
* Shift: Speed 2
* Sprint: Speed 3
* Dash: Speed 4

techniques.name: Disengage
techniques.desc: A careful reposition that never drops its guard.
techniques.move:
The movement granted by Disengage determines its Speed, as follows:
* Step: Speed 2
* Reposition: Speed 3
* Shift: Speed 4

techniques.name: Leap
techniques.desc: A quick hop, allowing one to avoid hazardous terrain.
techniques.special: A characer counts as _Flying_ for this action, but Melee Attacks do not receive Disadvantage.

techniques.name: Interact
techniques.desc: Sometimes.
techniques.effect: Interact is an Action that isn't covered by the other Actions in the game. Generally it involves interacting with the terrain in a distinct way, dealing with persistent combat effects, or fulfilling objectives on the battlefield. The Speed, Range, and Movement of this Action can vary depending on what is being undertaken. Your GM will determine the effects of Interact, with common examples listed in [MAKE EXAMPLES OF INTERACTS] here.
techniques.special: You may _Improvise_ Interact for no _Momentum_. However, you may pay the full 2 _Momentum_ cost and, instead of replacing the Action, treat Interact as a 0 AP Set-Up or Follow-Up Action. When used in this way, the Movement of Interact becomes Step.

techniques.name: Form Change
techniques.desc: By adopting a different fighting style or spirit stance, one can keep up with an ever-changing battlefield.
techniques.effect: Change your current Stance or Style.
techniques.imbue: 2 Momentum. Form Change is a Free Action.

techniques.name: Draw
techniques.desc: Switching weapons allows one to be prepared for any combat situation.
techniques.effect: Replace one or both of your Equipped equipment with a different piece of available equipment.
techniques.special: The Speed of Draw is equal to 1 + the total number of Hands of Equipment drawn or stowed. You may _Improvise_ this action for no _Momentum_ if you are drawing into an Open Hand.

techniques.name: Evasive Maneuvers
techniques.desc: Light on your feet, you prepare to dodge an incoming blow.
techniques.effect: Gain 1 Dodge Token.

techniques.name: Dodge
techniques.desc: You roll away, attempting to dodge an opponents strike.
techniques.effect: Force the attacker to reroll the attack. They must use the new result.

techniques.name: Guard
techniques.desc: You prepare your defenses, ready to knock away a strike.
techniques.effect: Gain 1 Block Token.

techniques.name: Deflect
techniques.desc: You deflect a strike with arms or armor, lessening the blow.
techniques.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1.

techniques.name: Find Opening
techniques.desc: You wait for an opening, preparing to strike.
techniques.effect: Gain 1 Punish Token.

techniques.name: Counter
techniques.desc: You lean into an incoming attack, affording you the chance to strike.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked by an adjacent enemy.
techniques.cost: 1 _Punish_, +1 _Punish_ if the Attack is Speed 4 or slower.
techniques.effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 1. You may immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a Speed 3 or faster _Maneuver_.
techniques.boost: 1 Momentum. You may instead Attack with a _Strike_.
techniques.special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_ or _Strike_ you choose becomes None.

techniques.name: Opportunity Attack
techniques.desc: You capitalize on an opening, taking the chance to assault a foe.
techniques.trigger: An enemy within your Reach makes Movement that is not Safe.
techniques.cost: 1 _Punish_ +1 _Punish_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
techniques.effect: Immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_.
techniques.boost: 1 Momentum. You may instead Attack with a _Strike_.
techniques.special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_ or _Strike_ you choose becomes None.

techniques.name: Grab
techniques.desc: A quick grab, to either reposition or grapple a foe.
techniques.effect: Attack using the below Profile.

techniques.name: Shove
techniques.desc: A push, either to the ground or away.
techniques.effect: Attack using the below Profile.

name: Land
flavor: Those that practice the Land Discipline make the ground beneath their feat their weapon, creating earthen barricades and laying their enemies low with mighty tremors.

stances.name: Fortress Stance
stances.desc: A powerful stance that constructs an unassailable fortress of earth and stone.
stances.accumulate: At Refresh, gain 1 _Momentum_ for every adjacent Earthen Barricade beyond the first, to a maximum of 2.
stances.effect: Adjacent Earthen Barriers become _Sturdy_.
stances.special: Whenever you are adjacent to an Earthen Barricade and are Attacked, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to destroy the Earthen Barricade, Blocking and gaining 1 Armor against the triggering Attack.

stances.name: Roiling Stance
stances.desc: The ground around those that have mastered the Roiling Stance is nearly a liquid, quaking and shaking constantly.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ for every hostile creature beyond the first in your Burst at Resolution, up to a maximum of 3.
stances.effect: Create a Burst 2 centered on you that moves with you. Creatures treat the spaces in this Burst around you as _Rough_.
stances.special: Whenever you _Expose_ a creature within the Burst created by this effect you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to instead inflict _Prone_.

stances.name: Sculptor Stance
stances.desc: A well-practiced Earthbonded can shape earth and stone as easily as clay, reshaping the field around them.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ for every Action you take that creates earthen _Rough Terrain_ or _Dangerous Terrain_.
stances.effect: At Refresh, you may change 2 _Rough or _Jagged_ spaces made of earthen materials into your choice of Normal, _Rough_, or _Jagged_. These spaces are chosen independently, and can be changed into different types.
stances.special: You may ignore _Rough_ and _Jagged_ Terrain made of earthen materials while in this Stance.

techniques.name: Collapse
techniques.desc: A powerful technique that creates a cave below the ground, then collapses the ground downwards, sending enemies into a painful fall.
techniques.effect: All spaces in the area become _Rough_. At Resolution, resolve the below Attack in the same area.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area becomes a Blast 3.

techniques.name: Jagged Earth
techniques.desc: Blades of the earth appear out of nowhere, suddenly striking a foe.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. Immediately after resolving the attack make a space adjacent to the target _Jagged_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. This attack becomes _Accurate_.

techniques.name: Earth Tomb
techniques.desc: By using nearby earth and stone the Earthbonded seals their foe away.
techniques.target: A Size 1 creature adjacent to at least two _Earthen Feature_s.
techniques.effect: Attack the target with the below Profile, destroying the _Earthen Feature_. On a Hit or Crit, _Entomb_ the creature in an Earthen Barricade. A creature may end _Entomb_ by spending 3 _Grit_ on their turn. If a creature spends _Skill_, they must immediately Move 1 and fall _Prone_. An Earthen Barricade is then created in their original space. If they cannot Move, they may not spend _Skill_.
techniques.special: If there are four adjacent _Earthen Features_: Either this Attack is _Accurate_, or you may target a Size 2 creature. Destroy all _Earthen Feature_s used for this Attack.

techniques.name: Quake
techniques.desc: A minor earthquake, firing earth upward and testing the footing of all involved.
techniques.effect: Attack all targets in the area with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 2 Momentum. Area becomes Burst 2.

techniques.name: Spikes
techniques.desc: Hardened spikes rise up from the earth, leaving a jagged wake that is difficult to traverse.
techniques.effect: The area immediately becomes _Rough_ and _Jagged_. Any character in the area must expend _Skill_ or gain _Hobble_ 1.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Place another Line 4 connected to the initial area.

techniques.name: Tremors
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded shakes the earth around them, making a sure footing impossible.
techniques.effect: Attack all targets in the area using the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 2 Momentum. Area becomes Boost 2.

techniques.name: Quicksand
techniques.desc: Liquified earth threatens to swallow the unaware whole.
techniques.effect: The target Area becomes _Rough_. If a Size 1 creature moves into a space with Quicksand they must spend 1 _Skill_. If a creature spends _Skill_, they may move through Quicksand for the rest of the turn without penalty. If they do not spend _Skill_, they sink into the Quicksand and are _Restrained_ until they _Sacrifice_ an Action and spend _Skill_ to escape. An adjacent creature can also Sacrifice an Action to free a creature from _Restrained_ without spending Skill. A creature _Restrained_ by Quicksand takes 3 True Damage at the end of the Round. A single space of Quicksand may only _Restrain_ one creature at a time.
techniques.special: A character may only have three instances of Quickand at a time, regardless of their size.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. You instead create the Quicksand in a Blast 1 area. Quicksand now triggers off Size 2 creatures as well.

techniques.name: Earth Kinesis
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded moves the earth of the battlefield around, choosing the shape as easily as breathing.
techniques.target: A Size 1 _Earthen Feature_.
techniques.effect:
Draw up to a Line 5 from a Target within Range and move it to the end of the Line. Any creatures in the Line are moved to the end of the Line unless they spend Skill or 2 Grit.
• If they spend _Skill_, they may Move 1 out of the Line. If they cannot Move out of the Line, they cannot spend _Skill_ in this way.
• If they spend _Grit_, they are not moved and the Feature is instead placed adjacent to them.
If a creature Immune to being moved is in the Line, instead place the Feature adjacent to them.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Target is: A Size 2 Earthen Feature or three Size 1 Earthen Features. If you move a Size 2 Feature, it instead costs 4 Grit to not be moved. Any creatures moved take 3 Physical Damage.

techniques.name: Earthen Bulwark
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded creates a mighty wall, fortifying their position.
techniques.effect: Create an Earthen Barricade in all spaces within the area. Any creatures in these spaces are immediately moved to an adjacent space of their choice.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Creatures of your choice moved by this ability gain _Expose_ 1 (_Skill_).

techniques.name: Earthen Shield
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded throws up a barricade, only using it when the right moment strikes.
techniques.trigger: You or a creature within range is Attacked.
techniques.effect: Create an Earthen Barricade adjacent to the triggering creature. Reduce the Attack Roll by 1, and grant the triggering creature 1 Armor against the triggering Attack.

techniques.name: Earth Slide
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded slides the ground beneath their feet forward, potentially leaving a wake of destruction behind.
techniques.effect: You may make the space you being your Move from _Rough_.
techniques.boost: A character may spend _Momentum_ to make spaces they moved through _Rough_, at a rate of 1 _Momentum_ per 3 spaces.

techniques.name: Burrow
techniques.desc: The Earthbonded moves through the earth like a mole, safely reaching their destination.
techniques.effect: This Movement ignores all terrain.

name: Boulder
flavor: The Boulder Discipline focuses on powerful strkes with great stones, creating an avalanche of heavy, driving strikes.

stances.name: Colossus Stance
stances.desc: The Colossus specializes in heavy armor made of stone, limiting mobility but providing unparalled defense.
stances.effect: At Refresh, you may choose to become _Slowed_ for the round. If you do, while you have any _Ablative Armor_, gain Resistance to all damage originating from 4 or more sqspaces away, but you are _Slowed_.
stances.special: If you have an Earth Enchant active at Refresh, instead gain 3 _Ablative Armor_.

stances.name: Rubble Stance
stances.desc: The Rubble Stance creates stones only to destroy them, using the rubble for enhanced mobility.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you Destroy a Boulder.
stances.effect: Every time you Destroy a Boulder, you may immediately Move 1 in any direction. Every time you Destroy a Boulder, you may deal 2 damage to all adjacent creatures, excluding yourself.

stances.name: Siege Stance
stances.desc: Flinging boulders is a combat staple of Earthbonded, but some are true masters of it, flinging boulders in precise arcs as soon as they are formed.
stances.accumulate: Every time you take an Action that moves or creates a Boulder, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Once per round in the Plotting phase, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to change the speed of an Action that creates a Boulder to Set-Up and Attach it to an action that targets a Boulder.
stances.special: When you take the Boulder Throw Action, instead of drawing a Line 6 from the Boulder you may instead move it to an empty space within Range 8 of it. Attack using Boulder Throw's profile in a Burst 1 around the Boulder's new location.

techniques.name: Chip Damage
techniques.trigger: You take Damage while having any _Ablative Armor_ created by an Earth Technique.
techniques.desc: You manipulate the shards of your shattered armor, striking back against your enemies.
techniques.effect: Attack all targets in the area with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: X _Ablative Armor_. For each _Ablative Armor_ spent, deal 2 additional damage on a Hit or Crit.

techniques.name: Rockslide
techniques.trigger: A creature enters a space adjacent to a Boulder within Range.
techniques.desc: A sudden shift of a boulder, throwing an enemy off-course.
techniques.effect: Attack the triggering target with the below Profile. If you _Push_ the target, move the Boulder so it is still adjacent to the target.
techniques.special: If this _Push_ moves the target adjacent to a new Boulder, you may pay the Cost again to repeat the Attack. A Boulder may only be used to attack once per turn.

techniques.name: Earthfall
techniques.desc: A quick coat of stone covers the weapon, amplifying the weight of the strike and leaving rubble near the target.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. If you Hit or Crit, you may add _Push_ 1 (Grit) to the attack. Regardless, create a Boulder in a space Adjacent to you.

techniques.name: Stone Strike
techniques.desc: You fling a fist-sized stone at great speed, knocking enemies off-balance.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Halve the Damage, but you may repeat this Strike immediately after using it.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.

techniques.name: Boulder Throw
techniques.desc: A boulder is launced in a straight line, bludgeoning all in its path.
techniques.target: A Size 1 Boulder.
techniques.effect: Draw a Line 6 from the Target, Attacking with the below Profile against all targets in the area. Move the Boulder to the end of this Line after attacking.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_ for each Size about 1 the Target is.
techniques.special: For each Size above 1 the target Boulder is, this Attack deals +1 damage on a Graze, Hit, or Crit.

techniques.name: Avalanche
techniques.target: All Boulders within Range.
techniques.desc: The Earthbound siezes control of all nearby boulders, flinging them in a great wave.
techniques.effect: Move all Targets 1 space in the same direction. If this would move the Target into an occupied space, Attack with the below profile. If this attack Pushes and the Target has remaining spaces to move, continue moving the Target.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. For every Momentum spent, move all Targets 1 additional space, deal 1 additional damage, and increase this Attack's Push by 1.

techniques.name: Fracture
techniques.target: A Size 1 Boulder within Range.
techniques.desc: A boulder within range detonates, sending a blast of stone shrapnel shredding through nearby enemies.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile in a Burst 1 around the Target, then Destroy the Target.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. You may choose a Size 2 Boulder. Instead of Destroying the Boulder, replace it with 4 Size 1 Boulders, then move each Boulder one space diagonally away from the previous Boulder's center.

techniques.name: Stone Gauntlet
techniques.desc: A fist of cobblestones forms around your hand, making unnarmed strikes hit like an avalanche.
techniques.effect: Equip the Stone Gauntlet Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Stone Gauntlets Equipped.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Stone Gauntlet in each.

techniques.name: Stone Shield
techniques.target: Unoccupied adjacent spaces made of earth or stone within Range, or two adjacent Size 1 Earthen Feature.
techniques.desc: A slab of stone becomes a barrier, defending against ranged attacks.
techniques.effect: Create a Line 2 Boulder in unoccupied spaces within Range. At the start of each of your Turns, you may Move the Stone Shield up to 3 spaces, and rotate it up to 90 degrees. The Stone Shield can move through occupied spaces, but may not end its movement there.
techniques.special: You may end this Enchant at the end of any of your turns and immediately fire the Stone Shield forward. Immediately use the Boulder Throw Technique with the Stone Shield, ignoring the typical Range of the ability.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead create a Line 3 Boulder.

techniques.name: Create Boulder
techniques.desc: Dirt and stone are formed into a mighty boulder, ready to be fired.
techniques.target: An unoccupied space made of earth or stone within range, or a Size 1 _Earthen Feature_.
techniques.effect: Create a Size 1 Boulder in the target space, or replace the _Earthen Feature_ with a Boulder.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead create a Size 2 Boulder, or create two additional Size 1 Boulders. This only costs 1 _Momentum_ if all Boulders created are replacing _Earthen Feature_s.

techniques.name: Stonescreen
techniques.target: A Size 1 Boulder in Range.
techniques.desc: With a powerful strike a boulder is shattered, staggering and pushing all nearby.
techniques.effect: Destroy the Target. Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target using the below Profile. The area is _Veiled_ for two _Phases_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. The Range is instead 5.

techniques.name: Avalanche Charge
techniques.desc: You charge forward, amplifying your speed by smashing through stones.
techniques.effect: During the Movement granted by this effect you can Move through Boulders, destroying them in the process. Gain 1 _Ablative Armor_ for every Boulder destroyed in this way. If you Attach this to an Attack, deal +1 damage on a Hit or Crit for each Boulder destroyed in this way.
techniques.special: All Movement granted by this Technique must be in a straight line, and must pass through at least one Boulder.

name: Grounding
flavor: The Grounding Stance allows characters to anchor themselves to the earth, becoming unmovable and immensely strong.

stances.name: Anchor Stance
stances.desc: By pulling oneself down into the earth, earth spirits can magnify their perceived weight many times over and become an unmovable bastion.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you do not Move when taking an Action with Movement, gain 1 Momentum.
stances.effect: While in this Stance, it costs one less _Grit_ to negate all Push and Pull effects.

stances.name: Mighty Stance
stances.desc: By drawing upon the earth the Earthbonded's strength becomes inhuman and a mighty driving force.

stances.name: Titan Stance
stances.desc: A difficult Stance to master, the Titan Stance allows an Earthbonded to make use of impossibly large weapons with ease.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ whenever you knock an enemy _Prone_ with a Titanic Weapon.
stances.effect: While in this Stance you may wield Titanic Weapons.
stances.special: You must pay 1 _Momentum_ at the start of each of your Turns or else acts as _Slowed_.

techniques.name: Mighty Throw
techniques.desc: Using their monstrous effective strength, the Earthbound flings a weapon not meant to be thrown.
techniques.effect:
Attack using the weapon's profile, adding the Thrown tag and treating Grazes as a Miss, dealing no damage and ignoring effects. In addition, use the following changes based on the Weapon's weight:
• Light: Range 10, add _Push_ 1 (_Grit_) on a Hit or Crit.
• Light: Range 6, add _Push_ 2 (_Grit_) on a Hit or Crit.
• Light: Range 4, add _Push_ 3 (_Grit_) on a Hit or Crit.

name: Stoneheart
flavor: The Stoneheart Stance channels the essence of the earth to make one's heart like stone and impenetrable to fear.

stances.name: Bold Stance
stances.desc: You channel the spirits of earth and stone, filling you with a dangerous, reckless bravery.
stances.effect: As a Free Instinctive Action, you may issue a brave challenge. Choose up to 3 hostile targets within Range 6. These targets gain Advantage on all attacks against you this round. Gain 1 _Momentum_ for each target selected in this way.
stances.special: While in this stance, you are immune to _Fear_, and you immediately remove any ongoing _Fear_ effects upon entering this Stance.

techniques.name: Crush Fear
techniques.desc: A quick coat of stone covers the weapon, amplifying the weight of the strike and leaving rubble near the target.
techniques.target: A creature within Range suffering from a _Fear_ effect.
techniques.effect: You or the Target may expend a _Will_ Token to cure a target within Range of _Fear_.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. For each Momentum spent, choose another Target beyond the first. No Targets beyond the first require a _Will_ Token.

techniques.name: Rouse
techniques.desc: You fill an ally with courage, allowing them to charge without a care in the world.
techniques.effect: Choose a creature within range. That creature may immediately Reposition, but must use all that Movement to move directly towards an enemy by the shortest possible route.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. The target gains 2 Armor while using the Movement granted by the Charge.

name: Tremorsight
flavor: Tremorsight allows an Earthbonded to read the vibrations of the earth, providing perfect knowledge of everything touching the ground.

name: Blaze
flavor: The Blaze Discipline possesses the most obvious Flamebonded techniques, centered around manipulating and conjuring flames.

stances.name: Inferno Stance
stances.desc: The most obvious use of flames, the Inferno Stance makes use of overwhelming firepower in a very literal sense.
stances.effect: Making additional Strikes in a Round cost half as much, so long as they have the Flame Keyword.
stances.special: For each subsequent Strike with the Flame Keyword you Hit or Crit a Target with in a Round, inflict _Burn_ 1.

stances.name: Jet Stance
stances.desc: Those that have learned the Jet Stance make use of the powerful gouts of flame to reposition themselves freely and move with blinding speed.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you Shift or Sprint as a part of an Action, gain 1 Momentum.
stances.effect: Whenever you use a Strike that deals Fire Damage, you may immediately _Safe_ Move 2 either before or after resolving the Attack.
stances.special: When using an Action or Reaction with the Flame Keyword, you may spend 1 _Momentum_ to increase the Movement by one level.

stances.name: Trailblazer Stance
stances.desc: Rather than simply burning their foes, the Trailblazer leaves a wake of flames behind them, creating deadly zones of fire across the land.
stances.accumulate: Every time an Action creates a _Blazing_ space, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: At Refresh, you may choose a _Blazing_ space within Range 6. Immediately make an adjacent space _Blazing_. You may pay up to 3 _Momentum_, repeating this Effect for every Momentum spent.
stances.special: While in this Stance you ignore _Blazing_ Terrain.

techniques.name: Ignite
techniques.desc: A sudden strike of flames, often leaving a foe wreathed in flames.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Destroy a _Blazing_ space within Range 3 of the Target. If you do, on a Graze, Hit, or Crit increase the _Burn_ by 2.

techniques.name: Flame Jet
techniques.desc: You let loose a mighty stream of fire, drawing upon nearby flames for additional power.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Create a number of _Blazing_ spaces within the area equal to the size of the Cone.
techniques.special: When you make this Strike, you may _Destroy_ any number of adjacent _Blazing_ spaces. If you _Destroy_ at least 2, the area becomes Cone 3. For each additional 2 spaces Destroyed, increase the Cone by 1.

techniques.name: Flame Wave
techniques.desc: A wide wave of fire shoots forth, scorching those in its path.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. If there is a creature adjacent to the Target, you may repeat Attack them with this Profile.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. If this attack Crits, inflict _Expose_ 1 (Skill).

techniques.name: Torch
techniques.desc: Overwhelming waves of fire strike a foe, burning through any defenses.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Add _Pierce_ 3.

techniques.name: Searing Strike
techniques.desc: A weapon is set ablaze or superheated, leaving a painful wound on a foe.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. On a Hit or Crit, inflict _Burn_ 1 and _Wound_ 1 (Skill).
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. If the Target has any _Burn_ prior to this Attack, increase the Damage by 2 on a Graze, Hit, or Crit.

techniques.name: Flamethrower
techniques.desc: You create a steady stream of flames from hands or mouth, blanketing the field in flames.
techniques.effect: Create a special zone of _Blazing_ spaces within the area. This zone moves with you and, at the beginning of a Phase, you may pay 1 _Momementum_ to change the direction of the zone. If a creature enters this zone or starts a Turn in it, you may pay 1 _Punish_ to use the _Ignite_ Action as a Reaction against them. This special zone goes away at the end of the Round.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead Cone 3.

techniques.name: Set Blaze
techniques.desc: A blaze is set, starting what can grow into a deadly inferno.
techniques.effect: The area immediately becomes _Blazing_. Any creature in the area gains _Burn_ 2 (Skill negates).
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Area becomes a Blast 1.

techniques.name: Fan Flames
techniques.desc: A small fire flares to life, buffeting those nearby with intense heat.
techniques.target: _Dangerous Terrain_ (Flame) within Range.
techniques.effect: Immediately make two spaces adjacent to the Target _Blazing_. If there is a creature in one of these spaces, they must immediately spend 1 _Evasion_ to Move into a space without _Blazing_ or gain _Burn_ 2.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Inflit _Impair_ 1 (Grit negates) on all creatures adjacent to the Target.

techniques.name: Fire Wall
techniques.desc: Small flames grow in intensity, becoming mighty infernos across the field.
techniques.target: Three contiguous _Blazing_ spaces within Range.
techniques.effect: These _Blazing_ spaces may be used as Cover until the end of the Round. In addition, the effects of _Blazing_ are doubled for the target for the duration.
techniques.special: Until the end of the round, any time an ally would move into a targeted _Blazing_ space you may pay 1 Momentum to allow them to ignore all Damage and Burn caused by the space.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Change the Target to 'Any number of contiguous _Blazing_ spaces, at least one of which is within range.'

techniques.name: Flame Blade
techniques.desc: A blade of flame ignites in your hand, burning away all in your path.
techniques.effect: Equip the Flame Blade Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Stone Gauntlets Equipped.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Flame Blade in each.

techniques.name: Fire Stepping
techniques.desc: You wreathe your feet in flames, leaving a wake of wild flames.
techniques.effect: Make up to three spaces you move through _Blazing_. Inflict _Burn_ 1 (Skill) on any creature you move past or through. While using this Movement, you are Immune to the effects of _Blazing_ spaces.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, make every space you move through _Blazing_.

techniques.name: Fire Shield
techniques.desc: You cloak yourself in flames, violently rebuking all melee attacks.
techniques.effect: While this Enchant is active you are Immune to _Freeze_ and _Burn_. Whenever a Melee Attack Grazes, Hits, or Crits you the attacker takes 2 Fire Damage.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Also inflict _Burn_ 1 when you are Grazed, Hit, or Crit.
techniques.special: If you are hit with an Attack with the Water keyword, you must pay 1 _Momentum_ or lose this Enchant.

name: Blast
flavor: The Blast Discipline ignores simple flames, focusing instead on powerful and sudden explosions.

stances.name: Explosive Stance
stances.desc: You make your explosions hit harder, forcing your opponents away from the detonation.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you Hit or Crit with an Explosive Attack, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect:
Whenever you use an Attack with the Flame keyword, you may choose to make it Explosive before making your Attack Roll. Gain a -1 penalty to the Attack Roll, but add the following:
• If the Attack is an Area, on a Hit or Crit _Push_ the Target out of the Area by the most direct route possible (_Grit_ negates). Resolve this _Push_ seperately from any _Push_ included in the Attack.
• If the Attack is not an Area, add _Push_ 2 (_Grit_) to all Hits or Crits.
• Add _Prone_ (_Grit_ or _Skill_) to all Crits.

stances.name: Flare Stance
stances.desc: Your flames burn brighter than most, blinding enemies that aren't properly prepared.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you Blind a foe, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: If you Crit with an Attack with the Flame keyword, you may forgo the normal Effect and reduce the damage by 2 to _Blind_ (_Grit_ negates).
stances.special: If an Attack would already _Blind_ on a Crit, instead increase the cost to Negate by 1.

stances.name: Ruinous Flame Stance
stances.desc: By focusing your flames for a moment you amplify their power, magnifying their destructive force.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you Hit or Crit with a Charged Attack, gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Once per round in the Plotting Phase you may choose to charge an Attack with the Flame keyword. If you do, increase the Speed of that Attack by up to 3. Gain a bonus to your Attack Roll or a bonus to Damage on a Graze, Hit, or Crit equal to that value and add the _Siege_ and _Unblockable_ keywords. You are _Slowed_ from the Phase of your Charged Action's original Speed until your Charged Action resolves.

techniques.name: Short Fuse
techniques.trigger: You are hit by an Attack
techniques.desc: You respond to an enemies' strike with an indiscriminate explosion, hopefully creating enough space for a opening.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.

techniques.name: Blasting Strike
techniques.desc: You explosively charge your weapon, letting out a mighty blast as you make contact.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. After resolving that, immediately attack in the Area, treating your initial Target as the origin and attacking directly away from yourself.

techniques.name: Explosive Blast
techniques.desc: You fire a close-ranged explosion, buffeting nearby enemies.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead Blast 3.
techniques.special: You may _Flying_ Move 1 directly away from the Area, or 2 if you Boost.

techniques.name: Volume of Fire
techniques.desc: A rapid-fire burst of explosions that can punish those without defenses.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. If the Target does not take an Evade or Block Reaction immediately repeat this Action against the same Target.
techniques.special: On a Crit, Boosting instead costs 0 _Momentum_.

techniques.name: Detonation
techniques.desc: A focused explosion of flame and force, becoming near-impossible to evade.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.special: If there are no other creatures or Terrain within Range 2 of the Target, add the _Sure Hit_ and _Unblockable_ Keywords.

techniques.name: Fireball
techniques.desc: A solitary mote of flame flies forth, before erupting into a truly horrific blast of flames.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.special: You may choose to delay this Attack. Take the Action at the original time, and mark the center of the Area at a point within range. At any point this Round, you may pay 2 _Momentum_ as a Reaction to Attack, gaining a +1 bonus to Damage on a Graze, Hit, or Crit. You automatically Attack at the end of the round if you do not use this Reaction.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Create 3 _Blazing_ spaces within the area.

techniques.name: Smoke Bomb
techniques.desc: An explosion choked with ash and smoke detonates, leaving an area on the battlefield choked with smoke.
techniques.effect: The Target Area becomes Veiled until the end of the Round.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Instead, becomes Veiled until the end of the next Round.
techniques.special: You may target a _Blazing_ space within Range. The Area becomes Blast 1, centered on the Target. Destroy the _Blazing_ space.

techniques.name: Volatile Mote
techniques.desc: You focus your energy, creating an explosion on the brink of detonation as an impromptu trap.
techniques.effect: Mark an unoccupied space within Range. When a creature moves into an adjacent space Attack in a Burst 1 around the Marked space, then remove the Mark.
techniques.boost: 3 _Momentum_. Reduce the Range to 4, but you may Mark two additional spaces.
techniques.special: You may pay 1 _Momentum_ to not trigger the space when a creature moves adjacent.

techniques.name: Flashbang
techniques.desc: An extremely focused, extremely bright detonation temporarily blinds a foe.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Instead target a _Blazing_ space within Range. Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target, then Destroy it.

techniques.name: Counterthrust
techniques.desc: A quick blast of flames allows a sudden, unpredictable change in momentum.
techniques.trigger: A Phase begins or you are Pushed.
techniques.effect: Deal 2 Fire Damage and inflict _Exposed_ 1 (_Skill_ negates) to a creature you move past with this Reaction.

techniques.name: Explosive Leap
techniques.desc: A quick detonation launches you into the air, providing enough propulsion for a sudden move.
techniques.effect: Deal 2 Damage (Skill negates) and _Push_ 1 within the area either at the start or end of your Movement.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_. Instead, Movement is Shift, Speed is 3, and Area is Burst 2.

techniques.name: Shaped Charge
techniques.target: Yourself or an ally is Attacked by a Flame Attack.
techniques.desc: You seize control of the flames around your ally, mitigating the effects of the blast.
techniques.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 2.
techniques.special: If the Triggering Attack is your own you may instead treat it as if you rolled a 3 against your ally.

name: Overheat
flavor: The Overheat Stance overclocks the natural processes of the body, providing a Flamebonded exceptional physical performance at the expense of their physical well-being.

name: Bloodboil
flavor: Those that practice Bloodboil manipulate the rage in themselves and others, allowing them to paint targets across the battlefield.

name: Flashsight
flavor: Flashsight allows Flamebonded to see brief flashes of the future in flames, providing a limited sense of clairvoyance.

name: Irondraw
flavor: Irondraw allows a Metalbonded to push and pull metal, providing exceptional defense and offense so long as there is a source of metal nearby.

stances.name: Anchored Stance
stances.desc: You are a master of anchoring yourself and are steady in your strikes, even without a true anchor.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you Push, Pull, or Slide an enemy with a Metal Action, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: You may treat yourself as an _Anchor_ for all Actions that have an increased effect if you are near an _Anchor_.

stances.name: Magnetic Stance
stances.desc: You are a bit more attached to your metal sources than most, causing them to rapidly fly back.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you would _Embed_ a Metal Source and choose not to, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you use an Action that uses a _Metal Source_ or Weapon, you may choose to pull the _Metal Source_ or Weapon back, either Equipping the item if you have an Open Hand or placing it in an adjacent square. If the _Metal Source_ was originally part of your Armor, you may immediately add it back to your armor.
stances.special: You may use the Magnetic Ward Reaction as if it had Range 4 and the Trigger 'You or a creature within Range are Attacked with metal.'

stances.name: Magnetoflier Stance
stances.desc: Using anchors to propel yourself to and from across the battlefield, you are as elusive as you are deadly.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Push_ or _Pull_ yourself with an Action with the Metal keyword gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: If you end your turn within Range 5 of an Anchor, you may either _Push_ or _Pull_ yourself 2, with the _Anchor_ as the source of the effect.

techniques.name: Magnetic Return
techniques.trigger: You Miss with a Ranged Attack using metal.
techniques.desc: A missed shot or throw is immediately pulled back for a surprise strike.
techniques.effect: Immediately repeat the Attack against the Target. If the Attack still misses, the metal returns to you.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. The attack becomes _Accurate_.

techniques.name: Crush
techniques.requirement: A creature that is a Metal Source.
techniques.desc: You compress metal around a creature, causing unavoidable damage.
techniques.effect: Deal 3 damage to the Target. If the Target is a Metalbound, they may pay 1 _Block_ or _Evade_ to negate this attack.
techniques.special: For each _Metal Source_ on a Target beyond the first deal +1 damage.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Inflict _Hobble_ 1 (_Grit_ negates) on the Target.

techniques.name: Shardstrike
techniques.desc: Metal flies forth from you, striking with telekinetic precision.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. Place the _Metal Source_ adjacent to the Target, unless you _Embed_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Choose a Metal Source within Range that is not Embedded. Originate the attack from the Metal Source rather than yourself.
techniques.special: Increase the damage by 1 for each _Anchor_ within Range 3 of you.

techniques.name: Lay Anchor
techniques.target: Size 1 or smaller _Metal Source_ within Range.
techniques.desc: You plant metal firmly into the terrain, providing a useful anchor to push and pull from.
techniques.effect: Move the Metal Source to a free space or Obstacle within Range. You may treat this Metal Source as an _Anchor_. Gain 1 _Momentum_.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Repeat the Effect with a new Metal Soure or Target a Size 2 _Metal Source_.

techniques.name: Shackle
techniques.target: _Metal Source_ on Self.
techniques.desc: You fire off metal towards a creature, seeking to restrain and wrap it around them.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. Place the _Metal Source_ adjacent to the Target unless you _Embed_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Choose a Metal Source within Range that is not Embedded. Originate the attack from the Metal Source rather than yourself.

techniques.name: Storm of Steel
techniques.target: Size 1 or smaller _Metal Source_ within Range.
techniques.desc: You pull metal into a rapid orbit about yourself, creating a flurry of deadly metal.
techniques.effect: Destroy the Target. Create a Burst 1 around you that moves with you and persists until this Enchant ends. Any creature that enters this Area or starts a Turn there takes 3 damage. If they end their turn there they gain _Expose_ 1 (_Grit_ negates).
techniques.special: You may instead originate this Action from an _Anchor_ within Range 6, treating the _Anchor_ as the origin for the Storm of Steel. If you do, Boost costs 2 less and does not require any additional _Metal Source_. You are Immune to all effects of this Storm of Steel.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. If there is a second _Metal Source_ or a Size 2 _Metal Source_ within Range, Destroy it. Increase the Area to Burst 2.

techniques.name: Attract
techniques.target: A Size 1 _Metal Source_.
techniques.desc: You reach out with magnetic force, drawing metal closer to you.
techniques.effect: If you are targetting an inanimate _Metal Source_, _Pull_ 4. Otherwise, Attack with the below Profile. If this _Pull_ causes the Target to collide with an Obstacle they take 3 damage and are knocked _Prone_ (_Skill_ negates).
techniques.special: You may instead Target an Anchor of any Size. If you do, _Pull_ yourself 4 towards the Target.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. Increase all _Pull_ effects by 1 or increase the Size of the Target by 1 for each _Momentum_ spent. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you.  In addition, you may _Pull_ X any unequipped _Metal Sources_ within Range.

techniques.name: Magnet Pull
techniques.target: Creature with a _Metal Source_ or an _Anchor_.
techniques.desc: You bond yourself to a metal source, either tethering it close to you or keeping it forcefully away.
techniques.effect: If the Target is a creature, choose one: Either all Movement towards you costs double and it costs 1 more to Negate all your _Push_ effects or all Movement away from you costs double and it costs 1 more to Negate all your _Pull_ effects. If the Target is an _Anchor_, you are instead Immune to all _Push_, _Pull_, and _Slide_ effects while within Range 3 of the _Anchor_. This _Enchant_ ends if the Target removes the _Metal Source_ or the _Anchor_ is destroyed.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. If there is an _Anchor_ within Range and you target a creature, instead create a bond between the _Anchor_ and the creature.

techniques.name: Repel
techniques.target: A Size 1 Metal Source.
techniques.desc: You lash out with magnetic force, launching the _Metal Source_ backwards.
techniques.effect: If you are targetting an inanimate _Metal Source_, _Push_ 4. Otherwise, Attack with the below Profile. If this _Push_ causes the Target to collide with an Obstacle they take 3 damage and are knocked _Prone_ (_Skill_ negates).
techniques.special: You may instead Target an Anchor of any Size. If you do, _Push_ yourself 4 from the Target.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. Increase all _Push_ effects by 1 or increase the Size of the Target by 1. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you. In addition, you may _Push_ X any unequipped _Metal Sources_ within Range.

techniques.name: Seize
techniques.target: A Size 1 creature with a _Metal Source_.
techniques.desc: You hold a creature aloft with magnetic force, leaving them defenseless.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. Increase The _Slide_ by 1 per _Momentum_ spent. Reduce the cost to _Boost_ by 1 for each Anchor within Range 3 of you.
techniques.special: The duration of the _Restrain_ depends on your Attack Roll. On a Graze, _Restrain_ until the end of the current Phase. On a Hit, _Restrain_ until the end of the current Round. On a Crit, _Restrain_ until the start of this Phase next Round.

techniques.name: Tear Away
techniques.target: Metal weapon or armor on a creature.
techniques.desc: You tear away an enemy's defenses, either disarming them or removing a portion of their armor.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. If you _Disarm_ you may place the weapon in an unoccupied square adjacent to yourself or immediately Equip it in an Open Hand. If you _Shred_, create a _Metal Source_ in an unoccupied adjacent square adjacent to you for each instance of _Shred_ inflicted.
techniques.special: The Status of this attack depends on if you target a weapon or armor. If you target a weapon, inflict _Impair_ 1 on a Graze, _Impair_ 2 on a Hit, and _Disarm_ on a _Crit_. If you target armor, inflict _Expose_ 1 on a Graze, _Expose_ 2 or _Shred_ 1 on a Hit, and _Shred_ 2 on a Crit. All Statuses are Negated by _Grit_, with a Crit requiring 2 _Grit_ to negate.

techniques.name: Magnetic Ward
techniques.desc: A metal weapon is pushed away at the last second, providing a remarkable defense.
techniques.effect: Reroll the Attack with Disadvantage and add the Evade Keyword to this Action, or reduce the Attack Roll by 2 and add the Block Keyword to this Action.
techniques.boost: 1 _Block_ or _Evade_ (whichever was not paid in the Cost). Use both Effects.

name: Steelforge
flavor: Steelforging changes to properties of nearby metal, whether that be making it razor-sharp or distorting its shape for an unexpected strike.

stances.name: Metaleye Stance
stances.desc: You see all nearby sources of metal, granting you a prenatural sense of all their locations.
stances.effect: You ignore the Veiled condition when attacked by a Metal weapon or when Attacking a creature wearing significant amounts of metal (such as armor). Once per Round, you may reduce the Cost of an _Evade_ or _Block_ Reaction by 1 so long as the Attacker is using a metal weapon.

stances.name: Unbreakable Stance
stances.desc: You reinforce all nearby metal, making it nigh-indestructible.
stances.accumulate: If you are wearing metal Armor or have a metal Shield _Equipped_, gain 1 _Momentum_ Refresh.
stances.effect: All Metal Obstacles within a Burst 3 gain Sturdy. In addition, Negating _Damaged_ and _Shred_ costs 1 less for yourself and all allies in a Burst 3, so long as the Weapon or Armor is made of metal.

stances.name: Unstoppable Stance
stances.desc: You subtly shape and reinforce your weapons, providing impossibly sharp edges that cut through all defenses.
stances.accumulate: If you have Metal weapons _Equipped_, gain 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh.
stances.effect: Gain a +1 Bonus to all Strikes made with a Metal weapon. On a Crit with Metal Weapons add _Unblockable_ to the attack.

techniques.name: Steelsnake Strike
techniques.desc: You reshape your weapon on the fly, striking from an impossible angle.
techniques.trigger: You Attack with a Metal Weapon.
techniques.effect: You may trigger this Reaction after seeing your Attack Roll. Reroll the Attack, using the higher of the two results. After the attack is resolved, the weapon becomes _Damaged_. Weapons _Damaged_ in this way return to normal at the end of combat.
techniques.special: You may instead _Damage_ your Weapon to add _Sure Hit_ to the attack.

techniques.name: Mercurial Strike
techniques.desc: You soften your weapon to the point it is near-liquid, not solidying it until the strike is nearly done.
techniques.reqs: Metal Melee or Reach Range Weapon Equipped.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. If the Weapon Range is Melee, give it Reach, or if is Reach increase it by 1.

techniques.name: Steelforged Strike
techniques.desc: You amplify all properties of your weapon, drawing upon the essence within for a devastating strike.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. Increase the damage by 1 on a Hit or Crit and the cost to Negate any Status inflicted by the weapon by 1.

techniques.name: Tungsten Strike
techniques.desc: A taxing strike that thwarts all defenses with an indestructible weapon.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile. If you roll less than a 7, treat the Attack Roll as a 7. On a Hit or Crit, _Shred_ 1 (2 _Skill_ negates).

techniques.name: Create Weapon
techniques.desc: You create a weapon from any nearby metal, forging it into something new.
techniques.target: A _Metal Source_ or an unequipped Weapon.
techniques.reqs: Must be Attached to a Strike with the Weapon Keyword
techniques.effect: Destroy the Target and gain 1 _Momentum_. Create any standard Melee Weapon made of metal at a point within Range. If you place it next to a creature with an Open Hand, they may immediately Equip it.
techniques.special: You may instead use this Action as if its speed was Set-Up. It must be Attached to a Strike with the Weapon Keyword. Resolve the Strike using the created Weapon from its current position.

techniques.name: Portcullis
techniques.desc: You weave metal into a intricate gate, blocking movement but not necessarily attack.
techniques.target: A Size 1 _Metal Source_.
techniques.effect: Destroy the _Metal Source_ and create a Portcullis in its place, or in any adjacent space if the _Metal Source_ is on your person. If you wish, the Portcullis can be an _Anchor_.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum_. Repeat the Effect X times.

techniques.name: Forge
techniques.desc: You take control of a nearby source of armor, shaping and forging it into armor plating on the fly.
techniques.target: A metal Weapon or metal Armor.
techniques.effect: If you target a Weapon, the creature wielding it gains Advantage on their next Attack with it and gains 1 _Punish_. If you target Armor, the creature wielding it gains 1 _Block_ and increase their Armor by 1.
techniques.special: If the Weapon is _Damaged_, remove _Damaged_. If the _Armor_ has any _Shred_, remove 2.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Instead, Range is 5.

techniques.name: Sap
techniques.desc: You drain the integrity of a nearby weapon or armor, leaving it brittle and weak.
techniques.target: A metal Weapon or metal Armor.
techniques.effect: If you target a Weapon, the Weapon becomes _Damaged_. If you target Armor, _Shred_ 3. When this _Enchant_ ends, the condition ends.

techniques.name: Perfect Armor
techniques.desc: You push your armor to its limits, creating armor that few weapons can pierce.
techniques.target: Metal Armor or Shield you have Equipped.
techniques.effect: If you target Armor, you may have up to 6 Armor passively and increase your Armor by 2 while this Enchant persists. If you target a Shield, gain an additional 1 Armor whenever you use it to _Block_ and reduce all Attack Rolls against you by 1 while this Enchant persists.

techniques.name: Absolute Defense
techniques.desc: You strengthen your armor in a flash, providing an unbreakable barrier.
techniques.reqs: Metal armor, weapon, or shield Equipped.
techniques.effect: The Attack Roll is a 5.

techniques.name: Shattering Rebuke
techniques.desc: Your steel becomes true while your foes' becomes false, forcing them sacrifice their blade or the attack.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked with a Metal weapon without the Ammunition property.
techniques.reqs: Metal armor, weapon, or shield Equipped.
techniques.effect: Choose: The attacker reduces their Attack Roll by 1 and their Weapon becomes _Damaged_ OR they reduce their Attack Roll by 4.
techniques.special: The Attacker may pay 1 _Skill_ to instead choose the Effect.

techniques.name: Create Armor
techniques.desc: You take control of a nearby source of metal, shaping and forging it into armor plating on the fly.
techniques.target: A _Metal Source_.
techniques.effect: Destroy the Target. Choose a friendly creature within Range or yourself. Increase their Armor by 1 for the remainder of the combat. If the creature  wishes, they may treat their Armor as one heavier.

name: Tempering
flavor: Tempering techniques take the stamina and essence of the Metalbonded and harden it, allowing them to push beyond their limits, ignoring all pain.

name: Soldertear
flavor: Metalbonded can manipulate the grief and sorrow in others with Soldertear technique, crushing their foes with feelings of hopelessness.

name: Dulling
flavor: Much like a Metalbound can dull their sense of pain, they can also blunt their senses, as well as those of others.

name: Tide
flavor: The Tide Stances focusing on pushing and pulling water, crushing foes in an oncoming wave while dictating the flow of a battle.

stances.name: Ebbing Stance
stances.desc: Your waves pull with a vicious undertow, dragging your foes closer to you with an unstoppable riptide.
stances.accumulate: Whenver you _Pull_ an enemy with an Action, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you Hit or Crit with a Water Action you may add _Pull_ 1 to the effect. If there is an existing _Pull_ on the Attack it is Negated by the same defense, otherwise, _Skill_.
stances.special: The cost to Negate all your _Pull_ effects while within 3 spaces of you is increased by 1.

stances.name: Flood Stance
stances.desc: You are a master of the tides, covering the battlefield in water as far as the eye can see.
stances.accumulate: Whenever a creature is _Pushed_, _Pulled_, or knocked _Prone_ on _Wet_ Terrain gain 1 _Momentum_, up to a maximum of 4 per round.
stances.effect: Any time you Hit or Crit with a Water Attack you may make a space adjacent to the Target _Wet_.
stances.special: You ignore the effects of _Wet_ Terrain.

stances.name: Flowing Stance
stances.desc: Your waves hit with an impossible force, leaving no avenue for retreat but back.
stances.accumulate: Whenver you _Push_ an enemy with an Action, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you Hit or Crit with a Water Action you may add _Push_ 1 to the effect. If there is an existing _Push_ on the Attack it is Negated by the same defense, otherwise, _Grit_.
stances.special: The cost to Negate all your _Push_ effects while further than 5 spaces from you is increased by 1.

techniques.name: Crushing Pressure
techniques.desc: Your waves holds your opponent against an obstacle for a moment longer, crushing them against the surface.
techniques.trigger: You _Push_ or _Pull_ a creature into an Obstacle or a creature with a Water Action.
techniques.effect: Attack the triggering creature with the below Profile. If this triggered off a _Push_ or _Pull_ into another creature, you may attack both, but have Disadvantage on both attacks.

techniques.name: Rushing Wave
techniques.desc: You propel yourself forward with a wave, before sending that wave crashing forth.
techniques.effect: _Destroy_ a _Water Source_ within Range 4. Attack with the below Profile, then make the Area _Wet_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. After resolving the Attack you may _Safe_ Move to any point in or adjacent to the Area.

techniques.name: Surging Stream
techniques.desc: You let loose a jet of water, pummeling an enemy backwards.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.special: If there is a _Water Source_ within Range 6, you may originate this attack from there. For this use, treat the Range as Melee and Area as Line 6. If the _Water Source_ has at least two adjacent _Water Source_s, this Attack gains _Accurate_.

techniques.name: Drag Down
techniques.desc: Your waves holds your opponent against an obstacle for a moment longer, crushing them against the surface.
techniques.trigger: You _Push_ or _Pull_ a creature into an Obstacle or a creature with a Water Action.
techniques.effect: Attack the triggering creature with the below Profile. If this triggered off a _Push_ or _Pull_ into another creature, you may attack both, but have Disadvantage on both attacks.

techniques.name: Water Whip
techniques.desc: You form a malleable lash of water, maintaining its form to make a useable weapon.
techniques.effect: Equip the Water Whip Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Water Whips Equipped.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Water Whip in each.

techniques.name: Aqua Lash
techniques.desc: You reach out with a torrent of water, wrapping it around a foe before drawing them close.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.
techniques.special: If there is a _Water Source_ within Range 6, you may originate this attack from there. For this use, treat the Range as Melee and Area as Line 6. If the _Water Source_ has at least two adjacent _Water Source_s, this Attack gains _Accurate_.

techniques.name: Aqua Ring
techniques.desc: You seize a nearby source of water, manipulating it into a ring around you to launch attacks from unpredictable angles.
techniques.target: Two _Water Source_s.
techniques.effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. So long as this _Enchant_ persists you may treat any space within a Burst 2 of you as the origin of any Water Attacks, treating it as a _Water Source_ if you wish. You may end this Enchant at any time to gain _Block_ equal to the number of _Water Source_s within your Aqua Ring.
techniques.special: Once per round on your turn you may pay 2 _Momentum_ to _Destroy_ an additional two _Water Source_s and increase the number of _Water Source_s your Aqua Ring counts as by 1.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Target is instead four _Water Source_s, and you may treat the ring as two _Water Source_s.

techniques.name: Water Sphere
techniques.desc: You pull a source of water free, creating a watery tomb to encase a foe in.
techniques.target: A _Water Source_.
techniques.effect: _Destroy_ all Targets. Create a Size 1 Water Sphere within Range. Any creatures in this space must immediately spend 1 _Skill_ to Move 1. Otherwise, that creature immediately becomes _Restrained_ within the Watery Sphere. While _Restrained_ in this way the creature takes 3 _True_ Damage at the end of each of their turns. A creature _Restrained_ by the Water Sphere can escape by Sacrificing an Action and expending 1 _Grit_ or _Skill_. If a creature moves into a space with a Water Sphere while there is no creature currently _Restrained_ in this space, they immediately become _Restrained_.
techniques.special: When you end this Enchant the spaces containing a Water Sphere and all adjacent spaces become _Wet_.
techniques.boost: 2 or 4 _Momentum_: If you spend 2 _Momentum_, Target is instead 3 _Water Source_s and you create a Size 2 Water Sphere. If you spend 4 _Momentum_, Target is instead 8 _Water Source_s and you create a Size 3 Water Sphere.

techniques.name: Call the Tides
techniques.desc: You become the center of the tides, pushing or pulling all water near you as you please.
techniques.target: All spaces with _Wet_ Terrain or _Water Sources_ within Range.
techniques.effect: You may either _Push_ or _Pull_ all Targets. Repeat twice. Any creature in a Target space suffers the same _Push_ or _Pull_. _Skill_ negates this for the remainder of the Turn. If a creature would collide with an obstacle, they are knocked _Prone_.
techniques.special: A _Water Source_ that is moved out of its original space by this effect instead creates _Wet_ Terrain adjacent to the _Water Source_.

techniques.name: Hydroplane
techniques.desc: You run along water, treating it just as stable as the ground itself.
techniques.effect: This Movement may be used to move along _Water Source_s as if they were normal terrain.
techniques.special: All Movement from this ability on either a _Water Source_ or _Wet_ Terrain is _Safe_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Up to three times, make a space you move through _Wet_.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_: You may treat all _Water Source_s as if they were normal terrain for this entire round and may safely end your turn on _Water Source_s.

techniques.name: Aquatic Armor
techniques.target: A creature.
techniques.desc: You create a thin coat of water around the target, providing a simple defense and quenching flames.
techniques.effect: The Target gains 1 _Block_ and X Endurance. The Target is _Immune_ to _Burn_ for the remainder of the round and clears all _Burn_ they currently posses.
techniques.boost: X _Momentum. For every 2 _Momentum_ spent you may _Destroy_ a _Water Source_ within Range 4 repeat this Action.

techniques.name: Water Wall
techniques.desc: A wave surges up in front of you, providing powerful, if temporary, defense.
techniques.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1. If the Attack was Melee, you may _Push_ the Attacker 2 (_Grit_ negates). If the Attack was Ranged, gain Cover against it.
techniques.special: If you are on or adjacent to _Wet_ Terrain this Reaction only costs 1 _Block_.

name: Tundra
flavor: Conjuring great constructs out of ice, masters of the Tundra Stance create weapons as beautiful as they are deadly.

name: Bloodbind
flavor: A skilled Waterbonded can control blood like any other liquid, either to staunch bleeding and heal or turn foes into gruesome puppets.

name: Still Waters
flavor: Water Spirits can easily drown out intense emotions, creating a sense of calm through Still Water techniques.

name: Rippleread
flavor: Water can reach into the past, allowing a Waterbonded to see the history of objects, or force a foe to briefly experience past trauma.

name: Gale
flavor: The most common Windbound discipline, masters of the Gale Stance control powerful gusts of wind and create minor tornadoes.

name: Storm
flavor: Channeling the essence of a thunderstorm, the Storm Stance creates powerful bursts of lighting that ripple over the battlefield.

name: Zephyr
flavor: The Zephyr Stance carries the body slightly aloft, allowing speed and reactions that push the limits of human capability.

name: Howl
flavor: Howl Stance masters channel ancient, primal fear of storms and winds to shake enemies to their core, sending them fleeing from the battle.

name: Windwhisper
flavor: The Windwhisper Stance reads currents in the air, allowing an incredible ability to predict and react to attacks.

name: Bark
flavor: The Bark Stance controls wood, allowing them to push the limits of wooden weapons and shift the shape of wood at-will.

name: Growth
flavor: By manipulating local plantlife, Growth techniques can turn a barren field into one choked with aggressive, hostile plantlife.

name: Root
flavor: Those that learn the Root arts can pull stamina from plants and others, using it to bolster their own.

name: Bloom
flavor: The Bloom Stance is one of the most beloved of the Wood Disciplines, as it can spark joy and happiness in themselves and others.

name: Mindrot
flavor: Mindrotters beguile the senses, creating false sensations that seem more true than reality itself.

techniques.name: Dual Strike
techniques.desc: A vicious attack, striking with two weapons in quick succession.
techniques.reqs: Separate Weapons Equipped in either hand.
techniques.effect: Immediately use the Quick Strike Action twice, using a different weapon for each Strike and declaring what weapon is being used before rolling the attack. The Damage from these Strikes is halved.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_. You may use the faster of the two Equipped Weapons to determine Speed.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. After rolling your first Attack, you may change which weapon it is using, so long as the target is within Range of the new weapon.

name: Heavy Weapon Master
flavor: A lesser warrior is controlled by the heavy weight of a large weapon; you have mastered it and honed it into a deadly pendulum.

stances.name: Executioner Style
stances.desc: Like wheat before a scythe, so are foes before your great weapon.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you defeat an enemy with a Heavy Melee Weapon, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: When you defeat an enemy with a Heavy Melee Weapon you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to deal damage to a creature within your Weapon's reach equal to any excess damage dealt to the defeated creature (_Evade_ negates).

techniques.name: Pommel Strike
techniques.desc: You quickly attack with the base of your weapon to create an oppening.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile.

stances.name: Bastion Style
stances.desc: A fighting style centered around the use of a shield to defend oneself and others.
stances.accumulate: Whenever an ally uses your Block Token, gain 1 Momentum. This may only trigger once per Phase.
stances.effect: While you have a Shield Equipped you may choose to allow adjacent allies to spend your Block Tokens for Reactions. In addition, while you have a Shield Equipped, adjacent allies gain +1 Armor against the triggering attack whenever they take a Block Reaction.

techniques.name: Iron Wall
techniques.desc: Making use of a shield, you ready an unstoppable defense.
techniques.effect: Gain 2 Block Tokens.
techniques.special: For the remainder of the Round, reduce the Attack Roll by 2 rather than 1 while using the Block Reaction.

techniques.name: Vigilant Defender
techniques.desc: With the defensive prowesse granted by your shield, you take a blow meant for another.
techniques.move: 1 _Momentum_ for Step, 2 _Momentum_ for Reposition, 3 _Momentum_ for Shift.
techniques.trigger: An ally within the Movement you paid for is Attacked.
techniques.effect: Immediately Move towards the ally by the shortest path possible, ending your move adjacent to the ally. Your ally takes only half of the damage from the triggering hit, while you take the other half.
